actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."users" SET
    "id" = 9,
    "name" = 'Raksha',
    "createdAt" = TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE '2019-07-01 06:30:00 CET',
    "updatedAt" = TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE '2019-07-01 06:30:00 CET',
    "status" = '',
    "gender" = 'Female',
    "avatar" = '',
    "email" = '',
    "address" = '',
    "role" = '',
    "dob" = '2019-07-01',
    "phoneNo" = ''
  WHERE id = 1; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
